00039 /// @file   ProbeListStl.h
00040 /// @brief  A resizeable and modifiable ProbeList object.
00041 ///         This object should be keept in sync with ProbeListPacked.
00042 
00043 
00044 /// This is used as an interchange format
00045 
00046 /// @brief     A probelist made from stl containers.
00047 ///            This is like ProbeListPacked, but it can be resized and modified.
00048 ///            See the SpfFile readers for example useage.
00049 
00050 /// @todo Rename this to ProbeListMutable or something better.
00051 /// @todo Put the probes in the blocks or make a bare block object for export.
00052 
00053 ///
00054 class ProbeListStlProbe {
00055 public:
00056   /// The 0-based probeid
00057   int    m_probeId;
00058   /// The GC count
00059   char   m_probeGc;
00060   /// The Apid of this probe.
00061   int    m_probeApid;
00062 
00063   /// A blank probe
00064   ProbeListStlProbe();
00065   /// @brief     construct a copy
00066   /// @param     p
00067   ProbeListStlProbe(const ProbeListStlProbe& p);
00068   /// @brief     Constructors
00069   /// @param     pid
00070   ProbeListStlProbe(int pid);
00071   /// @brief     Constructor
00072   /// @param     pid
00073   /// @param     gc
00074   /// @param     apid
00075   ProbeListStlProbe(int pid,int gc,int apid);
00076 
00077   /// zeros out the fields.
00078   void clear();
00079 
00080   /// @brief     probeId
00081   /// @return    probeId
00082   int id();
00083   /// @brief     returns "gc" count.
00084   /// @return    the gc count.
00085   int gc();
00086   /// @brief     analysis probe id
00087   /// @return    analysis probe id
00088   int apid();
00089   /// @brief
00090   /// @return    true of this is a null probe. (m_probeId==-1)
00091   bool isNull();
00092 };
00093 
00094 class ProbeListStlBlock {
00095 public:
00096   int     m_blockSize;          ///< the number of probes in this block.
00097   short   m_blockAnnotation;    ///< the annotation_code for this block
00098   int     m_blockAllele;        ///< the allele_code for this block
00099   int     m_blockContext;       ///< the context_code for this block
00100   int     m_blockChannel;       ///< the channel_code for this block
00101   int     m_blockRepType;       ///< the replicate_type for this block
00102 
00103   // While we could keep the list of probes in each block,
00104   // we keep a single vector of probes in the ProbeListStl.
00105   // this reduces the vector count.
00106   // This is here as a note of another way of doing it.
00107   // std::vector <ProbeListStlProbe> m_probeid_vec;
00108 
00109   /// @brief     new default block
00110   ProbeListStlBlock();
00111   /// @brief     Make a copy of the block
00112   /// @param     b
00113   ProbeListStlBlock(const ProbeListStlBlock& b);
00114   /// @brief     create and push a block.
00115   /// @param     bAnn
00116   /// @param     bAllele
00117   /// @param     bContext
00118   /// @param     bChannel
00119   /// @param     bRepType
00120   ProbeListStlBlock(int bAnn,int bAllele, int bContext, int bChannel, int bRepType);
00121 
00122   /// @brief     does this block match the Allele, Context and Channel?
00123   /// @param     qAllele   
00124   /// @param     qContext  
00125   /// @param     qChannel  
00126   /// @return    true if they are all equal.
00127   bool matchACC(int qAllele,int qContext,int qChannel) const;
00128 
00129   /// @brief Clear out the block to unset values.
00130   void clear();
00131 };
